title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Customized Science Learning Design Workshop for Elementary School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education fundamentals and at least three years of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can design three or more science class activities tailored to individual learners' cognitive characteristics.
Participants can develop two or more science project evaluation rubrics reflecting learner autonomy.

Participants can build and operate a low-cost LMS system within six months, using Android/iOS apps (React Native/Flutter) to monitor learning progress (task completion, quiz scores, study time) in real time and auto-generate weekly reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
